name: ColorChanger
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color changer
des: Color Changer offers children and kids of all ages a creative means by which they can express themselves through the beauty of colors on Echo buttons. With a click of a button, users can get a color on the Echo button, which is especially engaging for the little ones!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
